diagram.name: Acquire and provide skills

callbehavioraction.name: Assign personnel to projects based on personnel development and project needs
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Create and maintain staff assignment records
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Maintain and manage a skilled personnel pool to staff ongoing projects
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Maintain communication across projects to effectively allocate human resources throughout the organization and identify potential future or existing conflicts and problems with recommendations for resolution
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Motivate personnel by providing career development and reward programs
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Provide human resources to support all projects
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Resolve personnel conflicts between or within projects
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Schedule other related assets or, if necessary, acquire them
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg

callbehavioraction.name: Train or hire qualified personnel when gaps indicate that skill needs cannot be met with existing personnel
callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg
